skills.name: IF IT BLEEDS
desc: • Deal physical damage to a single target.
• Deal Additional Physical Damage to the the target based on their MISSING HP if their HP is at 50% or below.
• Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, on the target if they are bleeding.
• Reduce Healing by 90% on the target and inflict Bleed and Perfect Bleed on them for the duration of battle.

skills.name: NO FEAR, NO PAIN
desc: • Deal physical damage to all enemies.
• Disable Labyrinth Talismans on all enemies and prevent them from evading damage until they die before dealing damage.
• Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver effects, from all allies and Heal self for 10% of your MAX HP for each effect removed.
• Increase Max HP and ATK by 50%, increased to 100% if activated while at 50% HP or below.
• Gain Endure, Revenge and Golden Trap for 2 turns.

skills.name: NOWHERE TO HIDE
desc: • Immune to all Stun, Freeze, Sleep and Skill Disabling effects, including Silver and Innate effects.
• Attacks always land as Perfect Hits.
• Grant Perfect Vanish and Golden Trap to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
• Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 1 turn if vanished every turn.
• Inflict Mark of Diablo on a random enemy until they die every turn.
• Marked targets cannot revive or gain beneficial effects and take Additional Random Damage equal to 10% of their MAX HP when they take damage.
• This effect does not apply to bosses..
